issue.title: [CF 1444] No access via /tmw etc.
issue.body:
I can't access TellMeWhen anymore.

 

/tmw

/tmw options

/tellmewhen

 

are all not working. Under Interface>Addons>TellMeWhen I only have a big heading "TellMeWhen v. 8.4.2" with a small empty box below.

 

Nevertheless TellMeWhen itself is still working correctly with the setup I made a while ago. But I can't make any changes...


> Posted by CurseForge user Alakallanar | Imported from CurseForge issue #1444 | Raw

comments.body:
Install BugGrabber and BugSack and post any errors that you get that are related to TMW.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
